snippet.title: POPGOES Lost Dreams | Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
This video contains flashing lights and loud noises!!!

The second trailer for my upcoming game 'POPGOES Lost Dreams'.
This trailer showcases brand new gameplay clips and a pre-rendered cutscene.

'POPGOES Lost Dreams' is a fanmade sequel to Kane Carter's 2016 indie horror game 'POPGOES'. The game is being developed by ILikeGreen and is set to come out in the first half of 2023. It will feature an original soundtrack, never before seen gameplay and characters, and multiple hours of content.

Follow the project on social media!
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ILikeGreen14
GameJolt: https://gamejolt.com/@ILikeGreenDev

Credits are included in the video.
Trailer song 'You Are Not Alone' by ILikeGreen
